biotools.summary: HyAsP (Hybrid Assember for Plasmids) - tool that identifies, bins and assembles plasmid contigs following a hybrid approach based on a database of known plasmids genes and a greedy assembly algorithm.

bioschemas.name: HyAsP
bioschemas.summary: HyAsP (Hybrid Assember for Plasmids) - tool that identifies, bins and assembles plasmid contigs following a hybrid approach based on a database of known plasmids genes and a greedy assembly algorithm.
